title: The Perfect Boy
description: Ciara's summer must-haves:• Breezy beachside job• Bright white uber-short tennis skirt• Backstage passes for the B-Dizzy Crew• The Perfect BoyCiara Simmons is tired of random hook-ups with lame guys from school. She wants a boyfriend. So she waves good-bye to her wild LA ways and heads to Santa Barbara for the summer. When she sees sexy AJ rapping at a local club, she's sure he's the one! But AJ is only devoted to his music career. So Ciara and her pal Kevin develop a sneaky little scheme to pull AJ out of the limelight and into her arms. But does AJ have what it takes to be Ciara's perfect boy?
author: Hailey Abbott
